snippet: EVANS--Jack, of Great Neck, NY, died on January 14, 2016. He is survived by his loving wife, Joan, his cherished son, Jonathan, his devoted sister- in-law and husband, Barbara and Robert Schneiderman. Jack had an interesting and successful career as an Actor, a College Professor of English, and an Attorney in his 83 years of life. He was a Veteran of the Korean War. Jack was known for his generosity and his good humor. He was a loyal friend and a true Renaissance Man whose interests ranged from Judo, piloting, golfing, spectator sports, theater, opera, music, interest in old films, collector of books and nostalgia. He will be greatly missed by his family and long-time friends and will be with us forever in our hearts. Services to be held at Riverside Chapel, 55 No. Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY on Monday, January 18, 2016 at 10:30am. 1/3
